summary: This is an email forwarding a message about the transfer of Jeffrey Epstein documentation, including a log book, a 583 packet, a black binder, and a UPS envelope of documentation. The documentation was provided by a Lieutenant who is out on OWCP, and the email is sent from an Associate Warden in New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email discusses documentation related to Jeffrey Epstein, which is being transferred.

connections.description: The Lieutenant provided documentation related to Jeffrey Epstein, indicating a connection through law enforcement or correctional handling of Epstein-related materials.

events.title: Transfer of Epstein documentation
events.description: An email is sent forwarding a message about the transfer of a box containing four items of Jeffrey Epstein documentation, including a log book, a 583 packet, a black binder, and a UPS envelope.

keyFacts: Documentation related to Jeffrey Epstein was transferred in a box containing four items: a log book, a 583 packet in a six-part folder, a black binder, and a UPS envelope of documentation.
The documentation was provided by a Lieutenant who is currently out on OWCP (likely Office of Workers' Compensation Programs).
The email is from an Associate Warden in New York, NY, indicating Bureau of Prisons involvement in handling Epstein-related materials.
